title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Project-Based Coding Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Develop at least three subject-integrated educational app prototypes using MIT App Inventor.

Learners develop three or more science education scenarios, create design documents applying two variables, one conditional statement, and one logical structure per scenario, and achieve over 80% suitability scores in peer reviews and expert evaluations.
Implement at least two interactive interfaces and instructional strategies that enhance learner engagement.
Incorporate feedback on project improvements at least five times through weekly formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
